sentences: Dr. Katalin Szili, Secretary of State for the Environment, said the precautionary principle should be the governing factor in strengthening the commitments under the Convention.
Ahmad Abbas Ahmad said the implementation of precautionary measures should not negatively affect economies of developing countries, especially those based on fossil fuel exports.
TUNISIA: Mohamed Hedi Mlika, Minister of the Environment and Land Management, said that many countries and regions are vulnerable to climate change.
Africa needs financial support to implement the Convention.
enb_long_title: First Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
